recording.title: Take a job interview
recording.recording_private: Private: only teachers can view your video.
recording.choosing_category_description: When your press the button, your browser will ask permission for your webcam, accepting will turn it on. On your signal, the browser will start recording. Do not worry, you can always cancel or stop the recording at your will.
recording.choosing_category: Before you can start, you must choose a category of questions.
recording.warmup: You can warm up by challenging yourself answering questions from your preferred categories!
recording.change_preferences: You can always change your preferences in your profile.
recording.record_interview: Try the real thing and answer questions that only come from the category of your choice.
recording.record_interview_questions: You always get 5 random questions from the chosen category that you have to answer.

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.form_title: Choose 3 categories you want to answer questions about.
preferences.error: An error occurred during the adjustment of your preferences.
preferences.preferences_update_success: Your preferences have been adjusted successfully
